detaileddescription.para: Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be used by run-time event driven threads
OS thread handle for Application controller to be used by run-time blocking threads

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.

parameterdescription.para: A generic pointer to any context data structure which will be passed to the function when it is invoked by the command processor.
A generic 32 bit value which will be passed to the function when it is invoked by the command processor..

briefdescription.para: Responsible for controlling application control flow. Any application logic which is blocking in nature or fixed time dependent can be placed here.

parameterdescription.para: FreeRTOS task handle. Could be used if more than one thread is using this function block.

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.

parameterdescription.para: A generic pointer to any context data structure which will be passed to the function when it is invoked by the command processor.
A generic 32 bit value which will be passed to the function when it is invoked by the command processor..
